column2: "Fighting Darkers is a matter of stamina, and the class best suited for that is hunter."
"Rangers and Forces lose their breath mid-way and don't step it up when it gets tough."
"Really, Forces suck. For someone to not be able to attack when needed is unthinkable!"
"Hunters fight with all of their might. So getting exhausted is out of the question."
"If you're still undecided go hunter! Remember that."
